DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate effect PSE Music `` home-based '' loaded STS exercise program functional strength , gross motor function , daily participation , exercise involvement , motor control , gait speed child spastic diplegia .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Therapeutic Music Combined With Loaded Sit-to-Stand Resistance Exercise Children With Spastic Diplegia
DOC.criteria: child SD , age 5 13 yearold , GMFCS level I III able stand chair independently maintain stand 2 second without fall able follow verbal instruction orthopedic surgery , selective dorsal rhizotomy , use baclofen pump within 6 month orthopedic problem medical condition prevent child join resistance exercise program , obvious LE joint contracture , uncontrolled epilepsy , cardiopulmonary problem hear loss use hear aid mental disorder , pervasive developmental disorder attentiondeficit disruptive behavior disorder
